summary: Company Logo Upload feature tested successfully. All 11 backend tests passed. Frontend UI fully functional - upload, preview, persistence, and delete all working correctly.
passed_tests: test_01_upload_logo_png_success - PNG logo upload returns 200 with correct response
test_02_upload_logo_jpg_success - JPG logo upload returns 200 with correct response
test_04_upload_replaces_old_logo - New upload replaces old logo URL
test_02_logo_url_null_after_delete - logo_url is null after deletion
test_04_delete_nonexistent_logo_succeeds - Delete is idempotent (succeeds even if no logo)
Company Logo section visible with guidelines
Upload Logo button works and triggers file upload
Button text changes to 'Change Logo' after upload
Remove Logo button appears after upload
Remove Logo button deletes logo successfully
critical_code_review_comments: Backend upload-logo endpoint correctly validates file types (PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WEBP)
File size validation (5MB max) implemented correctly
Old logo file is deleted when new one is uploaded (prevents orphan files)
Frontend correctly handles all logo states (no logo, uploading, uploaded)
data-testid attributes properly implemented for all interactive elements
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_company_logo.py - Created new test file for logo upload feature
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - tests use dynamic file uploads
context_for_next_testing_agent: Company Logo upload feature is fully functional. Test file test_company_logo.py covers all backend endpoints. Frontend UI has proper data-testid attributes for automated testing.

features_verified.POST /api/company-master/upload-logo: WORKING - Accepts PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WEBP files up to 5MB
features_verified.DELETE /api/company-master/logo: WORKING - Deletes logo file and clears logo_url
features_verified.Logo preview on Company Master page: WORKING - Displays uploaded logo in preview container
features_verified.Change Logo button: WORKING - Button text changes after upload
features_verified.Remove Logo button: WORKING - Appears after upload, deletes logo on click
features_verified.Logo persistence: WORKING - Logo persists across page refreshes
